boolean.name: isSelectionOnDisplayPlannedTime
boolean.title: Selection on display planned time
boolean.help: By defining a selection here, the user will only be able to enter a displayed planned time from this selection. Be careful to define a selection with integer or decimal type values for it to work. If no selection is defined or the configuration is not enabled, no constraints apply to the time.

one-to-many.name: plannedTimeValueList
one-to-many.title: Planned time values
one-to-many.help: Time values that users will be able to enter in planification.

decimal.name: valueByDefaultOnDisplayPlannedTime
decimal.title: Value by default on display planned time
decimal.help: You can define here the default value for planned times.
